title: Having random moments where I can't control my champion but I still see him aaing in real time
body: I have played 2 games and I've seen it a few times before. I have random moments (10-20 seconds) usually sometimes more, Where I cannot control my champion. I will watch them aa minions in real time and they lose hp in real time also. has cost me a few games now any fix??

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing packet loss or an unstable connection to the servers. When your connection drops off, the server won't receive inputs from your client, therefore it will look like your champion isn't responding to what you're doing. While there are many causes to this, the most common solutions can be found on our [connection guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you still experience these issues after working through that guide.
